page.title: 06POLICING THE DISTRICT
page.content: Our area is policed by several different police men/women. Cheddingtons village policeman is P.C Buckle.He has to patrol Cheddington, Slapton,Ivinghoe and Ivinghoe Aston. Mostly P.C. Buckle deals with petty crimes,breakins,burglaries and vandalism.A policeman cant walk through all the villages so he has a Panda car.Inside his car there is a radio with which he can either contact Aylesbury police station or his H.Q at Kiddlinton.When he captures a criminal he has to take him directly to Aylesbury police station. The panda cars are not used on motorways as are traffic cars,(often called Jam Sandwiches)The main headquarters is in Kiddlinton where they have a helicopter used in emergencies.
